message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm looking to sell for $22,000. I know this is a high starting point, but I'm confident it reflects the true value of what I'm offering.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $18,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate you countering. While $22,000 is my ideal price point, I'm willing to come down to $20,000. This offer reflects the significant value this product brings.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $19,000.
